title: How to Make Cranberry and Apple Crisp

steps.headline: In a medium bowl, combine sugar, flour, and lemon zest; mix well.
Add lemon juice, apples, and cranberries; stir to mix.
In a small bowl, combine oats, brown sugar, flour, and cinnamon.
Add melted margarine; stir to mix.
Bake in a 375ºF oven for approximately 40-50 minutes or until filling is bubbly and top is brown.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

text: Prepare the filling In a medium bowl, combine sugar, flour, and lemon zest; mix well.  Add lemon juice, apples, and cranberries; stir to mix.  Spoon into the baking dish.  Prepare the topping In a small bowl, combine oats, brown sugar, flour, and cinnamon.  Add melted margarine; stir to mix.  Sprinkle topping over filling.  Bake in a 375ºF oven for approximately 40-50 minutes or until filling is bubbly and top is brown.  Serve warm or at room temperature.  Finished.
